{author:"Avantir Yihn",title:"Details",resolved:1b,pages:["You'll find more scrolls on your journey.

The class of a scroll is a rough determinant of its power. That is, Class 4s are stronger than Class 2s.

Whenever you cast most scrolls, the time required to cast that","particular scroll next time will increase. Some scrolls do not have this limitation. Scroll cast time resets on death.

Some scrolls are damaged, but may be repaired with a Scroll Imprinter."]}
